name: [Group31] Ghosts VS Exorcists
description:
In this 2v2 couch co-op, you and your friends will take on roles of either brave exorcists or devious ghosts and will enter a haunted house.
There, the ghosts are not so happy about the exorcists’ mission to cleanse the house via performing rituals on cursed objects spread throughout the house.
They came well prepared to defend themselves against the ghosts and carry out their mission. Meanwhile, the ghosts will stop at nothing to protect their belongings and prevent the exorcists from completing the mission.
The clock is ticking, and time is running out. Will the exorcists be able to cleanse the house before it is too late? Or will the ghosts be victorious? Grab your friends, choose your side and play!

The Controls Our team

Programmers
